===============================
Bon Voyage
===============================

.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/YeoLab/bonvoyage.svg?branch=master
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/YeoLab/bonvoyage

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/bonvoyage.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/bonvoyage


Transform percentage-based units into a 2d space to evaluate changes in distribution with both magnitude and direction.

* Free software: BSD license
* Documentation: https://bonvoyage.readthedocs.org.
